channel.title: LibreNMS Notifications
channel.description: RSS feed for notifications to LibreNMS users

item.title: Alerting packet loss macro
item.description: The packet loss macros were broken recently. The quick fix is to have them resemble device up/down, which is similar to how they would function if fping_options.count=1. Hopefully, they can be fixed in the future, but be aware their functionality is degraded in the meantime.

item.title: Removal of ciscoASA table
item.description: On the 12th of February 2025, we will be merging in pull request 16952 (https://github.com/librenms/librenms/pull/16952) which will remove the ciscoASA table. Please see https://community.librenms.org/t/remove-of-the-ciscoasa-table/26978 for further information.

item.title: Storage table change
item.description: The storage table structure has changed and storage_deleted and storage_mib were removed. If you have alert rules that reference those fields, you can remove storage_deleted and change storage_mib to type.

item.title: cisco-access OS removal
item.description: We will be merging the cisco-access (C1200/C1300 based devices) OS into the ciscosb OS. This will be done on the 20th of March 2025. If you have any alert rules or groups that reference this old OS then please update them include ciscosb as soon as possible.

item.title: OS Definitions and discovery yaml file relocation
item.description: As part of the continued effort to improve LibreNMS, it's code base and associated files, we will be migrating the yaml files used for OS detection and support. Please see https://community.librenms.org/t/os-definitions-and-discovery-file-relocation/27646 for further information.
